segments.text: I see the woman standing there so focused, her lapful of dishes commanding all her attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But how can she be so unaware of the growing puddle at her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s almost fascinating to watch her ignore such a glaring problem in her own home.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of disbelief that she hasn't felt the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children might as well be performing a circus act next to her, yet she remains oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: In a way, it's impressive how lost she is in her chores, but what about the kids' safety?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What will happen when the water reaches a tipping point, or worse, when one of them falls?
segments.speaker: PAR
